entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Greenwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 09:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: NE 35 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries or periods of ice pellets changing to freezing rain near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
